snippet: PECK--Norman. Symphony Space mourns the passing of our loyal friend, Norman Peck. As president of the Peter Jay Sharp Foundation, he made the transformative gift that resulted in the naming of our Peter Jay Sharp Theatre. We send our condolences to his family. Steven Aresty, Chair Cynthia Elliott, Pres. & CEO Andrew Byrne, Artistic Dir. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman. Symphony Space mourns the passing of our loyal friend, Norman Peck. As president of the Peter Jay Sharp Foundation, he made the transformative gift that resulted in the naming of our Peter Jay Sharp Theatre. We send our condolences to his family. Steven Aresty, Chair Cynthia Elliott, Pres. & CEO Andrew Byrne, Artistic Dir. 1/3
